oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Victorian autograph commonplace book of Robert Johnson, Junior
Great Britain
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Johnson, Robert
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A Victorian commonplace book (similar to a scrapbook), this one was written by a Robert Johnson, Junior, in 1846. Topics include a poem written about his brother's death, diary entries describing Ibrahim Pasha as well as a cricket match, fireworks, and performances. Several of the pages are written in shorthand.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ibrāhīm, Pasha, 1789-1848; Commonplace books; Great Britain -- History -- Victoria, 1837-1901 -- Biography; Autographs -- Great Britain; English literature -- 19th century.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: 99 unnumbered pages (11 pages written in shorthand) : illustrations ; 19 cm + 1 information sheet (29.5 x 21 cm)
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library; American University in Cairo
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: This item is in the public domain.
